title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Intensive Short-Term Course in Beginner Swahili Business Communication

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational foreign language learning experience or intermediate proficiency in another language
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can pronounce Swahili alphabets and basic phonetic rules with 90% accuracy.
Learners utilize 150 essential vocabulary words in everyday business situations (greetings, appointments, negotiations).
Learners reproduce 10 core expressions (e.g., contract confirmation, price negotiation) applicable on-site through role-playing.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
